text: Marian Calafeteanu (born 8 November 1965) is a retired Romanian football midfielder.WeltfussballFootballdatabase ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Liga I players Category:Israeli Premier League players Category:CS Universitatea Craiova players Category:Hapoel Be'er Sheva F.C. players Category:Hapoel Bat Yam F.C. players Category:Maccabi Ironi Ashdod F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Israel
